message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I appreciate your offer, but $90 is too low for me.  Could you do $130?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $130. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
